question_text: Fill in the blank to check if the number is greater than 3 in an if-else statement.
Which operator checks if two values are equal?
Which statement is used to specify a block of code to be executed if a condition is false?
What is the purpose of the 'else' statement?
correct_answer: To execute a block of code if the if condition is false
wrong_answer1: To execute a block of code if the if condition is true

question_text: Which of the following is the correct syntax for an 'else if' statement?

Which statement is used to check a new condition if the first condition is false?
